Crimes.Crime_Name: Making False Statements under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in making an adverse credibility finding
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding due to inconsistent documents and implausible claims
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Inconsistent identity documents and oral testimony
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of forced marriage and rape in Burundi
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of credible evidence and failure to prove identity
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to establish identity and provide consistent narrative
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness of the Board's credibility assessment
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credibility and unestablished identity
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Fabricated narrative, lack of knowledge about key personal details
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to the reasonableness of the credibility finding
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose or verify identity
